main.desc1: KapKap is the first Attention layer between

feature.title: Feature
feature.item1title: Attention Matching: Precisely Reach High-Value Users
feature.item1content: KAPKAP reconstructs the logic of traffic distribution: AI-assisted construction of three-dimensional portraits of social interactions, behaviors, and consumption, quantifying the attention value of players, so that advertising budgets can accurately target high-value user groups.
feature.item2title: AI Intelligent Engine, Enabling Zero-Trial-and-Error Growth
feature.item2content: Based on massive data and testing cases, KAPKAP builds an AI intelligent growth engine, which conducts full-cycle diagnosis of product approval, launch, operation, etc., and provides professional product plans and operation schemes.
feature.item3title: One-Click Access to the Global Market, Focus on Polishing Products
feature.item3content: KAPKAP's mature SDK integrates global payment, deposit and withdrawal, and advertising aggregation links, with built-in AI multi-language support and data analysis background. Developers only need to focus on the game itself, and we will clear all localization and commercialization obstacles for you.
feature.item4title: AI Improves Efficiency, Making Content Production Never Exhausted
feature.item4content: KAPKAP provides a variety of AI tools, allowing everyone to develop and promote game products with low thresholds. Based on the growth flywheel of "attention value + content production", an infinitely expanding ecological moat is built.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.step1: Precise User Portraits and Efficient Traffic Distribution: Build an AI-driven multi-dimensional user portrait system, launch an "attention value" matching market, and achieve accurate traffic allocation.
roadmap.step2: AI Intelligent Growth Engine: Launch the AI intelligent growth engine to provide professional product and operation services.
roadmap.step3: One-Click Publishing SDK System: Aggregate multi-platform payment, advertising, and other functions.
roadmap.step4: Data and Intelligent Decision-Making Hub: Establish a data analysis center and intelligent decision-making system, integrate AI functions, and optimize automated operations.
roadmap.step5: Mini Game Generation AI Tool: Launch an AI-generated mini game tool and promotion platform to realize the commercialization of users' creative value.
roadmap.step6: Standardized Publishing and Scaling: Build a standardized publishing system, expand AIGC and creator economy globally, and reach 5 million DAU.

qa.title: Q&A
qa.q1: How can we contact you, and what types of projects are eligible for support?
qa.a1:
You can reach out to us through the following channels:

Website: Visit www.kapkap.io and submit your project details via the contact form at the bottom of the page.
Social Media: Follow us on Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, Facebook, or Threads, and send us a direct message or comment.
Support Email: Email support@kapkap.io, and we’ll respond within 24 hours.
Developer Hotline: Schedule an online meeting through our website to discuss project details directly with our business team.

Eligible Projects for Support:We prioritize innovative, high-growth-potential projects with clear target audiences, particularly in:

Indie games with unique gameplay or narrative experiences;
Mobile or cross-platform casual or mid-core games;
Games with global market potential, especially in emerging markets;
Projects leveraging AI technology or data-driven growth strategies.When submitting, please include a detailed project plan, market positioning, and team background. We evaluate projects based on feasibility and market potential. Supported projects receive tailored technical support, resources, and marketing assistance.
qa.q2: What are the project evaluation criteria, and how do they relate to the level of support provided?
qa.a2:
Evaluation Criteria:KapKap assesses projects based on the following dimensions:

Innovation: Unique gameplay, themes, or technological advancements;
Market Potential: Size, spending willingness, and growth potential of the target audience;
Team Capability: Technical expertise, past projects, and execution strength;
Data Performance: Existing metrics (e.g., DAU, retention rates, monetization) if available;
Platform Fit: Alignment with KapKap’s AI tools, SDK, and global support capabilities.

Relation to Support Levels:

S-Tier (High-Potential Projects): Full support, including priority access to the AI Smart Growth Engine, customized operational plans, global payment and ad integration, and dedicated data analytics.
A-Tier (Promising Projects): Standard SDK integration, access to AI tools, and partial marketing resources.
B-Tier (Growing Projects): Basic technical support and data analytics tools to optimize performance.The tier determines the priority and depth of resource allocation, with S-tier projects achieving faster global launches and user growth.
qa.q3: What are KapKap’s upcoming milestones and plans?
qa.a3:
KapKap’s roadmap includes the following milestones:

Q1-Q2 2025: Enhance the AI-driven multi-dimensional user profiling system and launch the “Attention Value” matching market for precise traffic allocation and improved ad efficiency.
Q3 2025: Roll out the AI Smart Growth Engine, providing end-to-end professional product and operational services to reduce trial-and-error costs.
Q4 2025: Introduce the “One-Click Publishing” SDK, integrating multi-platform payment, advertising, and localization features to streamline developer workflows.
Q1 2026: Establish a Data and Intelligent Decision-Making Hub, integrating advanced AI functionalities to optimize automated operations and real-time strategy adjustments.
2026 and Beyond: Build a standardized publishing system, expand AIGC (AI-Generated Content) and the creator economy globally, targeting 5 million daily active users (DAU).
qa.q4: What are the advantages of choosing KapKap?
qa.a4:
Choosing KapKap offers the following benefits:

Precise User Targeting: AI-driven Attention Matching uses social, behavioral, and consumption data to create user profiles, enabling precise targeting of high-value users and optimizing ad budgets.
AI Smart Growth Engine: Built on extensive data and testing, it provides full-cycle diagnostics and professional operational solutions for rapid iteration and growth.
One-Click Globalization: A mature SDK integrates global payments, deposits/withdrawals, ad aggregation, and AI-powered multilingual support, allowing developers to focus solely on game development.
Low-Barrier Content Creation: AI tools enable easy game content and marketing material production, reducing development and promotion costs.
Data-Driven Decisions: Built-in analytics dashboard for real-time monitoring of user behavior and game performance, optimizing retention and revenue.
Proven Success: Projects like Genki Miner, Mars 2049, and TT Hero achieved high retention and growth (e.g., TT Hero’s 34.9% 2-day retention during its rising phase).
qa.q5: How do I integrate KapKap’s SDK?
qa.a5:
Integrating KapKap’s SDK is straightforward:

Register a developer account at www.kapkap.io.
Download the latest SDK package, which includes detailed documentation and sample code.
Follow the documentation to integrate the SDK into your project, typically completed in a few hours.
Once integrated, access global payments, ad aggregation, multilingual support, and analytics.

For technical assistance, contact support@kapkap.io for one-on-one guidance.
qa.q6: Does KapKap support small indie developers?
qa.a6:
Yes, KapKap warmly welcomes small indie developers! We offer:

Free AI Tools: Content generation, user profiling, and basic analytics to reduce development costs.
Flexible Support Plans: Indie teams can apply for A- or B-tier support, gaining access to technical resources and partial marketing assistance.
Community Support: Join KapKap’s developer community (e.g., Discord) to connect with peers and stay updated on platform news.
Low-Cost Globalization: The one-click publishing system enables indie teams to enter global markets without localization challenges.

We encourage indie developers to submit creative projects, and KapKap will provide tailored support based on project potential.
qa.q7: How does KapKap ensure data security and privacy?
qa.a7:
KapKap adheres to strict data security and privacy standards:

Compliance Certifications: The platform is SOC II Type II certified, ensuring data handling meets international security standards.
Data Encryption: All user data and transactions are protected with end-to-end encryption to prevent unauthorized access.
Privacy First: We collect only essential data for user profiling and analytics, fully complying with GDPR and other global privacy regulations.
Transparent Policies: Developers can monitor data usage and control sharing settings via the dashboard.

For further details, contact support@kapkap.io to request our privacy policy.
qa.q8: What is KapKap’s revenue model and profit-sharing mechanism?
qa.a8:
KapKap offers a transparent and flexible revenue-sharing model:

Ad Revenue: Through KapKap’s ad aggregation system, developers access global ad networks (e.g., AdMob, Unity Ads), with KapKap taking a service fee (contact support@kapkap.io for specific rates).
In-App Purchases: Via KapKap’s global payment system, developers receive a high revenue share, with the platform charging a minimal transaction fee.
Subscription Models: For games with subscriptions, KapKap provides flexible management tools, with revenue splits based on project tier and performance.
Transparent Settlements: Revenue data is updated in real-time on the developer dashboard, with detailed monthly financial reports.

For detailed terms, submit your project and connect with our business team.
qa.q9: What systems can be integrated with KapKap?
qa.a9:
KapKap’s SDK and platform support the following integrations:

Payment Systems: Global payment methods, including credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and regional options like Alipay and WeChat Pay.
Ad Networks: Integration with platforms like AdMob, IronSource, Unity Ads, and AppLovin, supporting interstitial, rewarded video, and native ads.
Analytics Tools: Built-in modules for user behavior tracking, retention analysis, and LTV calculations, compatible with third-party tools like Firebase Analytics.
Localization Support: AI-driven multilingual system covering 50+ languages, automatically adapting to regional cultural and linguistic nuances.
Social Features: Player engagement tools like leaderboards, friend invites, and sharing, compatible with platforms like Facebook and Twitter.
Cloud Services: Cloud saves and cross-device synchronization for secure, seamless player experiences.

Developers can select modules based on project needs, with comprehensive documentation and support for quick integration.
qa.q10: How do I apply for KapKap’s support program?
qa.a10:
To apply for KapKap’s support program, follow these steps:

Submit Project: Upload a project brief via the developer portal at www.kapkap.io, including game type, target market, team background, and existing data (if any).
Initial Review: The KapKap team will evaluate within 5 business days and provide feedback via email.
Detailed Discussion: Engage with our business team via online meetings or email to finalize project details and support plans.
Agreement Signing: Sign a support agreement outlining resources and revenue-sharing terms.
Support Rollout: Integrate SDK, access AI tools, and leverage marketing resources to kickstart growth.

We recommend submitting a detailed project plan (PDF format) to expedite the review process. For assistance, contact support@kapkap.io.
